Name: VR Shooting Range: Multiple Weapons
About the game: A shooting simulator for the HTC Vive / Oculus Rift / Oculus Quest. The VR Arcade Shooting Range Mix speed and accuracy to turn into a crazy shooting expert! Shoot, change guns, shoot again. Comfortable. More weapons are coming in future updates. Every elite shooter must find their perfect weapon. Pick your favorite gun. Featuring four guns for now, and score tracking / ranking. Easy to handle... ... but hard to win No.1 In the game, the player can choose one of the four guns for target shooting. After the bullets are consumed, the player will get his current score and record it in the ranking of the corresponding firearm. The player can choose himself unlimited times Favorite gun to play the game
